input.sentences: the couple was excited to visit the waterfall .
the woman saw a beautiful butterfly .
the woman enjoyed feeding the animal .
output.sentences: Josh, and Kelly were excited to visit the waterfall in the town where they took holiday.
They saw a woman nearby seemingly call a butterfly to her, and Kelly thought that was beautiful.
Josh always did think that waterfalls were amazing.
It was almost hard for him that they left it, and visited an animal petting zoo.
Kelly felt like a real woman, feeding an animal who enjoyed her nurturing side.
